alert.note: Alert for Logan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 7:33PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Thomas and north central Logan Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 733 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles north of Winona, or 15 miles southeast of Brewster, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Thomas and north central Logan Counties, including the following locations... Mingo. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 46 and 52, and between mile markers 57 and 63. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
